entry.title: Under Pressure
entry.summary:
Author: bloodbythemiddleeast (laptopsocks)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,307Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 464

Summary: There’s almost something unsettling about how that moves you—how Jason’s character could be cracked open by a single Jane Austen line, buried in the pages of a book he keeps within reach. It softens him, grinds the edges of his form in your memory, sands the grit from his words in your hand, and you think this living arrangement might not be too bad after all. What’s so bad about a big man reading a little bit of Jane Austen, anyway? In which your roommate keeps arriving home bloodied and bruised, stubborn and a little cruel.

entry.title: The Loneliest of Star Crossed Lovers
entry.summary:
Author: RedSakura101

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,172Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 0

Summary: This little series follows the blossoming friendship that blurs into love between you and Jason, until it is cut short suddenly with his death. Now you must find a way to cope and live without him. Not knowing whether you’ll ever be able to move on from the boy you loved. Luckily in life we are given second chances.

entry.title: This time I look to see what's between the lines
entry.summary:
Author: Nyxin00

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,467Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 28

Summary: You're a trouble-maker, it's in your blood. You can't help goading men twice your size into an unfair fight, knowing you always have the upper hand. There's something about seeing them go down hard, fast and with a look of shock. It makes your blood sing in your veins. Of course, the one time you get caught the court mandates anger management classes, thanks to your clear record. You'll go, if only to avoid the officer you know is chomping at the bit to kick down your door. And if you keep going for the guy you can share quiet discontent with around the coffee machine, then who's to blame you?

entry.title: The House hunger built
entry.summary:
Author: FearTheHime

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,266Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 344

Summary: "Of course I eat people, I mean...It's not something I would broadcast since it's...well Gotham and they began to make a phad about it because the citizens are brilliantly...stupid."Bodies are piling up, whatever is left. Families; different backgrounds, different ethnics, religions, looks are being eaten and whatever is left into a master piece. Some sort of art with the remains and everyone was losing time and leads to find out who has been feasting upon Gotham citizens. Jason however, knew of a Cannibal that he totally never mentioned to Bruce. It's not Jason's fault he died before revealing his darkest discovery and that discovery is in the form of a boy he had left behind. [M/N] [L/N]; Mortitan, brilliant, a chef of his own making and conisear of flesh.All Jason needed to do is sweeten the deal in a way that drives all people, after all at the end of the day {M/N] is human after all."Besides..it's people...they are literally born every day..so who cares if a few of them...just disapear once in a while?"

entry.title: Stray
entry.summary:
Author: Miya (GhostMiya)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,215Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: It's been two years since Selina Kyle plucked you off the streets and raised you in better conditions than you had ever dreamed of. Alongside the mantle that you are learning how to don, you know you can't hide behind your new life and live in solitude forever.Even if the first steps include a mission with that broody Bat and his aggressively bright bundle of joy, Robin.You have things to prove, though. With or without a too-happy voice clogging the comm line.First in a self-indulgent series.

entry.title: Velvet Crowbar
entry.summary:
Author: VenusCrytrap

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,071Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 766

Summary: The kid next door has it rough. There’s nothing much anyone can do about it in a place like the Narrows, but you lead with as much kindness as you can afford and try to make his life a little easier. He crushes on you the way a lot of kids do on their babysitter, but he’s too young and too scrawny. He fears you’ll never take him seriously. Life tears you apart, but when the universe puts you in his path years later, Jason thinks he may finally have a shot- even though you’re both a little different. And a little worse. (Or: Jason reunites with the babysitter he had a big fat crush on)

entry.title: Arkham's Echoes
entry.summary:
Author: Honey_bellie

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,884Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 3

Summary: "You have been locked up in Arkham Asylum for longer than you can remember vividly and now standing before of you was Jason Todd.Are you hurt?" No, the opposite actually, it was the first time in years you were seeing Gotham's tragically beautiful night sky and you couldn't feel any better, more alive."You escape the Arkham Asylum with Jason, the place he has been a prisioner of Joker's for years now and you are a patient that has no idea how she got there. This is story is about healing and finding hapiness and love after traumatics experiences, althought it is difficult journey, fill with angst, step-backs, and difficult feelings between two broken souls, it's all worth it in the end.This work is composed of two parts, two chapters.

entry.title: futile devices
entry.summary:
Author: al_lion_e

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,804Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 87

Summary: “That’s gonna get infected.” Comes a voice from down the alley, cold and disinterested. You freeze, and look up. “Oh.” “I mean,” says a man in a recognizable red helmet, “unless you disinfect it. Gothams dumpsters carry germs scientists haven’t even discovered.” He's leaning against the brick wall to your right near the entrance of the alley, his broad, intimidating figure literally blotting out the lights beyond. It's strange to see him so close up- in person, not in blurry photographs in magazines, or on the news.   Or: Encounters.
